message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $12,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand your position, Bob. How about we split the difference and settle at $10,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
